name: Veni Veggie Frutty
description:
Veni veggie frutty is game entirely made within a week around a school exercise designed to emulate what a client relationship is like. We as a team tried to make the best game possible in this little time.  

Van der Brugghen solutions being a familial transport company who essentially ships food.  

We decided to follow the steps that were already taken by a lot of match-3 games and design around a few gameplay elements (here vegetables and fruits) giving them a juicy and fun look with googly eyes and a bit of animation. Gameplay-wise the game is quite simple, we unfortunately had little time to think of and implement new mechanics that would have made the game unique.
